translation.en: -Oh, hey. Listen, I was-- -[teen] Well, well, well.
Looks like they sent us the perfect woman for the job.
Oh, crap. What kind of ranch did I walk into?
Horses, mostly. You like horses?
-Not that much. -Wait!
-Aren't you from the nanny agency? -No.
Dang. Do you have any experience taking care of kids?
-No. -Have any experience lyin'? I do.
Hey, y'all! Come meet our new nanny! I'm Tuck, and you are?
translation.ko: 얘들아! 새 보모 오셨어! 전 턱인데 이름 뭐예요?

translation.en: Not a nanny. Look, my truck died, my phone died.
-I just need to use your phone-- -[Tuck] Y'all, get down here!
translation.ko: - 전화만 빌려 쓰고… - 다들 내려와 봐!

translation.en: -Everybody, this is our new nanny. -I'm not a nanny.
translation.ko: - 집합! 새 보모가 오셨어 - 나 아닌데

translation.en: New nanny, that's Brody, Dylan, and Chloe.
translation.ko: 새 보모님 여긴 브로디, 딜런, 클로이예요

translation.en: Hey, y'all. Is your mama or daddy around?
translation.ko: 안녕, 얘들아? 엄마, 아빠 집에 안 계셔?

translation.en: I'm having a breakdown. My truck, and emotional.
translation.ko: 지금 미쳐 날뛰고 있어 트럭도, 내 정신도

translation.en: Actually, our mama died two years ago.
Oh, I'm so sorry.
-Thank you. -And thanks for showing up, Nanny…
No, Bailey. Just Bailey. I just need to use your phone,
translation.ko: 그냥 베일리라고 부르면 돼 전화만 좀 쓰게 해줘

translation.en: call a mechanic, get back home, wherever that is.
translation.ko: 정비사 불러서 어딘진 몰라도 집으로 가야 해

translation.en: You forgot where you live? Did you check the tag on your backpack?
translation.ko: 어디가 집인지 몰라요? 가방의 이름표는 봤어요?

translation.en: Honey, I wish it were that simple. Never date a musician.
translation.ko: 그렇게 간단하면 좋겠구나 음악하는 사람은 절대 만나지 마

translation.en: Oh, honey. It's okay.
It's okay. I just need to use a phone.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마, 전화 한 통만 하자

translation.en: Cell phone. Home phone. Xylophone.
translation.ko: 휴대폰, 집 폰, 실로폰 다 좋아

translation.en: -Oh, is that a phone? -[Tuck] It doesn't matter.
-Storm knocked out all the phone service. -Of course it did. Why do you hate me?
translation.ko: - 폭풍으로 전화가 끊겼어요 - 어련하겠어 제가 뭘 잘못했죠?

translation.en: Look how good she is with children!
She's straight up Mary Poppins, bro. I think nanny number ten is a winner.
Ten nannies? What is wrong with y'all?
translation.ko: 보모가 10번까지 있어? 너희 무슨 문제 있니?

translation.en: Her. She's got some anger issues.
Are you kiddin' me?
We're not hiring her just 'cause you fools think she's hot.
translation.ko: 모지리들 눈에 멋져 보인다고 고용할 수는 없어

translation.en: "You fools" think I'm hot?
-Smokin'! -So hot.
You have no idea how much that means to me.
translation.ko: 얼마나 힘이 나는 칭찬인지 너희는 모를 거야

translation.en: You can't imagine what I've been through, and for y'all to think--
translation.ko: 오늘 밤에 겪은 온갖 수모를 생각하면…

translation.en: Résumé, ma'am. I… I don't have a résumé, because I'm--
Because you think you can just stroll through life on your good looks?
No, because I'm not equipped to do anything. [sobs lightly]
translation.ko: 아니, 난 이력서에 쓸 게 하나도 없어서 그래

translation.en: Tell you what, we'll double whatever you were making at your last job,
translation.ko: 전에 벌던 연봉의 두 배 드리죠

translation.en: unless, of course, we find out you were fired,
in which case we'll have to cut your salary in half and strip your bonuses
translation.ko: 일단 월급 절반에 보너스 없이 시작했다가

translation.en: until you prove yourself. It's called playing hardball, people.
translation.ko: 실력 입증하면 올려줄게요 강수를 둔다는 건 이런 거야

translation.en: Sweetie, you mind sittin' next to me? I'm a little scared of thunder.
translation.ko: 친구야, 옆에 앉을래? 난 천둥이 무섭거든

translation.en: Well, I guess if you're scared.
It's okay.
Lord help me, another brother?
Ah! You flatter me. I'm actually the daddy of all these.
And I'm the daddy's girlfriend of all these.
Well, you are early for your interview, and I like that.
translation.ko: 면접 시간보다 일찍 오다니 마음에 드는군요

translation.en: -Oh, actually, Mr.-- -Beau.
-Mr. Beau-- -No, Beau's my first name.
-Beau Beau? -Just Beau.
Just… Just my Beau. [chuckles]
And who might you be? Oh, I'm Bailey. I was--
Our new nanny.
Bailey, Summer. Summer, Bailey.
All right, let's go, Daddy. Can't be late.
-See ya after school, Nanny. -Whoa, hold on there, Tuck.
translation.ko: - 학교 다녀와서 봬요, 보모 - 잠깐만, 턱

translation.en: [laughing] Your daddy hasn't even checked her references yet.
She thinks I look like their brother. You're hired.
translation.ko: 나도 이 집 아들 같다고 했어 합격입니다

translation.en: Why are we wasting time?
She's young, she's pretty, she's great with kids.
-I'm not a nanny! -That will greatly reduce your salary.
translation.ko: - 난 보모 아니야! - 그러면 연봉 팍 깎여요

translation.en: Bailey, if you're not a nanny, what exactly you doin' in our house?
translation.ko: 베일리, 보모가 아닌데 우리 집엔 왜 왔죠?

translation.en: Well, it all started last night
when me and my boyfriend, Boone, were singing at Tootsies.
Our band's been playing that club forever,
but last night, Mr. Sam Gold from Sam Gold Records was coming in to see us.
translation.ko: 어젯밤에 '샘 골드 레코드'의 샘 골드 사장이 찾아왔어요

translation.en: He's one of the biggest producers in country music.
If he likes you, it can change your whole life.
And not to toot our own horns, but we crushed it.
translation.ko: 잘난 척하는 건 아니지만 우린 무대를 뒤집어 놨어요

translation.en: ♪ Dream baby got me dreaming sweet dreams The whole day through ♪
translation.ko: 꿈 같은 그대 덕에 한낮에도 단꿈을 꾸었어

translation.en: ♪ Dream baby got me dreaming sweet dreams Nighttime, too ♪
translation.ko: 꿈 같은 그대 덕에 한밤에도 단꿈을 꾸었어

translation.en: ♪ I love you and I'm dreaming of you But that won't do ♪
translation.ko: 당신을 사랑해 꿈에서 만났지만 그걸론 부족해

translation.en: ♪ Dream baby, make me stop my dreaming You can make my dreams come true ♪
translation.ko: 꿈 같은 그대, 날 깨워줘 내 꿈을 이뤄줘

translation.en: Turns out, Mr. Sam Gold didn't think we crushed it
translation.ko: 샘 골드 씨가 보기엔 무대를 뒤집은 게 아니었나 봐요

translation.en: the way I thought we crushed it, and I was crushed.
translation.ko: 샘 골드 씨가 보기엔 무대를 뒤집은 게 아니었나 봐요 내 속만 뒤집어졌죠

translation.en: So, why are you in our house?
Needless to say, I was pretty devastated,
but Boone didn't wanna wallow in our misery.
He wanted to talk about our future.
Bailey, you know how much I love you, right?
I do. Yeah, I do.
I do. Oh my gosh, Boone, you're not… [gasps]
[laughing] Lord have mercy, you are!
The answer is yes!
I will! I will!
You will what?
Let you go on.
Go on.
Right. The thing is, the boys and I've been talking,
and we decided that if tonight was a bust, which it most surely was,
translation.ko: 오늘 공연 망했을 때를 대비해 계획을 세웠는데 역시 망했지

translation.en: that we, the band, needed to make some… some changes, you know?
translation.ko: 역시 망했지 그렇게 되면 밴드에 변화를 주자고 했거든

translation.en: Shake things up a bit. Go in a different direction.
Okay. What direction?
You're out.
-She's in. -What?
Bailey, the band's been together for nine years and we still haven't made it.
translation.ko: 우리 밴드 결성 9년째인데 아직도 못 떴잖아

translation.en: I mean, someone has to change. So you're trading me in for her?
translation.ko: - 누구 하나는 바꿔야지 - 그래서 날 버리고 쟤를?

translation.en: I mean, just professionally.
But it is all good. Because who still loves Bailey?
translation.ko: 걱정할 거 없어 베일리 짝은 여전히 누구?

translation.en: This guy!
Are you out of your mind, Boone? We're a team! Together forever!
translation.ko: 정신 나갔어, 분? 우린 팀이야! 해체 불가라고!

translation.en: You either take all of me…
or none of me!
[sobs] He picked none of me.
Oh, you poor thing.
I am gonna call you an Uber this minute to take you home.
translation.ko: 재깍 우버 불러줄 테니까 집으로 가요

translation.en: I don't have a home.
Me and Boone lived together.
So that's why you were driving all night in this storm?
translation.ko: 그래서 이 폭풍우 치는 밤에 차를 몰았군요?

translation.en: You had no place to go?
No. Can you believe it? In one night, I lost my home, my career, and my man.
translation.ko: 그래, 말이 되니? 하룻밤 새에 집, 직장, 남자를 잃었어

translation.en: So,
you're single?
Listen, if someone could please just give me a ride to the service station--
-[Chloe] Tornado! -All right, come on.
Y'all know the drill. Everyone in the basement.
translation.ko: 다들 대피 방법 알지? 전부 지하실로 가

translation.en: [Summer] Wait for me!
I know you don't know me,
so I understand if you don't want me to come down-- I'm coming down.
translation.ko: 빼놓는 게 당연하겠지만 저도 같이 가요

translation.en: Y'all?
[screams] Y'all!
Sorry.
[Beau] Oh, careful on those stairs, Bailey. They're very steep.
translation.ko: 계단 조심해요, 베일리 경사가 아주 가팔라요

translation.en: No, don't worry about me, sugar.
translation.ko: 난 괜찮아 내 걱정은 하지 마, 자기야

translation.en: My stilettos are much safer than her flat steel-toed boots.
translation.ko: 저 여자의 카우보이 부츠보다 내 스틸레토가 훨씬 안전하니까

translation.en: So, this is how it all ends.
What's under there?
It's the last nine nannies.
You're kidding, right?
Oh, honey. You're shiverin'.
Y'all are so lucky to have each other.
In times like these, I guess I'll have to ride out the rest of the tornadoes in my life alone.
translation.ko: 난 죽을 때까지 이런 폭풍우를 혼자 버텨내야 하겠죠

translation.en: Darlin', I'm sure there's someone special waiting for you.
Out there.
I sure do envy y'all. You all have such a beautiful family.
Thank you. Where's your family, Bailey?
Oh, I don't really have much of a family other than Boone.
translation.ko: 분 말고는 가족이라고 할 사람도 없어요

translation.en: And, well, you know what happened there.
As far as my other family, my mama ran out on me when I was two.
translation.ko: 그 외의 가족이라면 두 살 때 날 버린 엄마가 있죠

translation.en: Who would walk out on you?
So far, Boone and her mama. And she's just gettin' started.
translation.ko: 아직 분이랑 엄마까지 밝혀졌고 얘기 더 남았나 봐

translation.en: -[girl] I've got you, Chlo. -[Beau] Boys! Over here.
♪ I've been cheated, been mistreated ♪
♪ When will I be loved? ♪
♪ I've been put down I've been pushed round ♪
♪ When will I be loved? ♪
♪ When I find a new man That I want for mine ♪
♪ Always breaks my heart in two ♪
♪ It happens every time ♪
♪ I've been cheated, been mistreated ♪
♪ When will I be-- ♪
Stop! Stop!
She doesn't like The Everly Brothers?
I can do Doobie or Jonas.
[Beau] Cassidy?
-Cassidy, baby, open the door. -What's happening?
-[Beau] Honey, please. -I got ten bucks on her not opening it.
-Sweetheart, this has gotta stop. -What's gotta stop?
You keep saying you're fine, but this is not a good indication.
translation.ko: 말로는 괜찮다고 하지만 이건 좋지 않은 신호야

translation.en: What's she indicatin' she's not fine about?
Honey, it's been almost two years since your mama passed.
translation.ko: 캐시디, 엄마가 세상 뜬 지 2년이 다 됐잖니

translation.en: Please, just stop shuttin' us out.
translation.ko: 캐시디, 엄마가 세상 뜬 지 2년이 다 됐잖니 그렇게 숨지 마

translation.en: Baby?
I think maybe she needs a woman's touch.
I'm uppin' it to 50.
Cassidy? Cass?
G-friend?
I don't know what to do anymore. I mean, what am I supposed to do?
translation.ko: 나도 답을 모르겠어 내가 뭘 어떻게 해야 돼?

translation.en: She won't talk to me or a psychiatrist. She won't even cry.
translation.ko: 나뿐 아니라 의사한테도 마음을 안 열고 울지도 않아

translation.en: She hasn't shed one tear since her mama died, and that's not normal.
translation.ko: 엄마 죽고 눈물 한 방울도 안 흘린 건 문제가 있단 얘기야

translation.en: -Let's keep goin'. We were cookin'. -What about your sister?
translation.ko: - 그냥 노래나 하죠, 잘 맞던데 - 동생은 어쩌고?

translation.en: -She's the reason we can't play. -Tuck!
I'm sorry, Daddy, but it's been two years. We had a band with our mama,
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 벌써 2년 째예요 엄마랑 같이 밴드를 했지만 돌아가신 후로는

translation.en: but since she died, we haven't been allowed
translation.ko: 엄마랑 같이 밴드를 했지만 돌아가신 후로는 악기조차 못 만지게 됐어요

translation.en: to touch these instruments. Because of her.
translation.ko: 악기조차 못 만지게 됐어요 - 쟤 때문에! - 턱, 거기까지

translation.en: Tuck, enough.
I agree. It is enough.
For two years, we've had to watch everything we do and say in front of her.
translation.ko: 2년 동안 캐시디 눈치 본다고 아무것도 못 했어요

translation.en: Don't mention Mama in front of Cassidy.
Don't play music in front of Cassidy.
Well, we lost our mama, too.
Why does our whole family have to live by her rules?
translation.ko: 왜 온 가족이 쟤한테 맞춰 살아요?

translation.en: No, Cassidy.
-[Chloe] Daddy, no! -I'll go, Daddy.
-No, I will. -None of y'all are going out there.
-She probably went to her room. -We go, we'll find her faster.
translation.ko: - 방에 갔을 거예요 - 둘이 가면 금방 찾아요

translation.en: -Why don't all of three of us-- -Bailey went.
Cassidy?
Cassidy!
Cassidy?
[Bailey] Cassidy?
I know you're in here.
It's the only place out here that has a cover.
"Had" a cover.
Come on, Cassidy. Even the horses had the good sense to get the heck out.
translation.ko: 나와, 캐시디 말들도 분위기 파악하고 도망갔어

translation.en: Look at me. Cryin' like a fool.
Wipin' myself with the jacket he gave me. Boone gave me this jacket
translation.ko: 분한테 선물 받은 재킷에 눈물이나 닦고 있다니 처음 사랑 고백하던 밤에 선물한 건데

translation.en: the first night he told me he loved me, Cassidy. I hate this jacket!
translation.ko: 처음 사랑 고백하던 밤에 선물한 건데 꼴도 보기 싫어!

translation.en: But I love him.
And I love this jacket.
Cassidy, I'm sorry about the guitar and the singin', okay?
translation.ko: 캐시디, 기타 치고 노래한 건 사과할게 미리 알았다면 안 그랬지

translation.en: I never would've done it if--
[yells] Oh, Cassidy, I don't wanna die!
Last night was a different story, but…
I mean, if I never saw the sun come up, I did not care.
translation.ko: 그대로 눈 딱 감고 죽어도 아쉬울 게 없겠더라

translation.en: But then, honey, some kind of miracle happened.
I heard this voice callin' out to me.
"What doesn't kill you makes you stronger. Stand a little taller…
translation.ko: '안 죽고 버티면 강해져 당당히 일어서야 해'

translation.en: somethin'-somethin'-somethin' when I'm alone."
And that's when I knew God was trying to send me a message via Kelly Clarkson.
translation.ko: 하느님이 켈리 클라크슨을 통해 나한테 말씀을 전하셨고

translation.en: And now Kelly Clarkson, via me, is sending it to you.
translation.ko: 이젠 켈리 클라크슨에서 나를 거쳐 너한테 말씀하셔

translation.en: You gotta be strong.
You gotta carry on.
-You gotta-- -[Cassidy] Good Lord.
All I've been hearing about since you got here is this guy broke your heart,
you got nowhere to live, your career's over.
translation.ko: 살 집이 없다 일자리 잃었다가 전부잖아요

translation.en: And I'm so sorry about that, Cassidy. But right now, we need to--
This is my mama's guitar!
It's all I have left of her, and you just pick it up like it's nothing!
translation.ko: 이거 하나 남기셨는데 허락도 없이 쳤잖아요!

translation.en: It's everything!
She was everything, and now she's gone!
And it's not fair!
No, you're right, life is not fair. Which we won't have if we don't get outta here!
translation.ko: 그래, 인생은 억울한 거야 근데 못 도망치면 그나마도 없어

translation.en: Who cares?
translation.ko: 그래, 인생은 억울한 거야 근데 못 도망치면 그나마도 없어 - 그러라죠! - 아니지

translation.en: No, don't talk like that. Your mama wouldn't want you talking like that.
translation.ko: - 그러라죠! - 아니지 그렇게 말하지 마 엄마가 들으면 좋아하시겠니?

translation.en: -How do you know what my mama'd want? -Well, I know she'd want you to be happy.
translation.ko: - 뭘 좋아하실지 어떻게 알아요? - 네가 행복하길 바라실 거야

translation.en: How do you know I'm not happy?
translation.ko: 내가 안 행복한 건 어떻게 알죠?

translation.en: A guess?
Well, if I'm not happy, it's 'cause for two years
translation.ko: 내가 행복하지 못한 건 지난 2년 동안 다들

translation.en: everyone's been telling me what to do and how to feel.
translation.ko: 내가 행복하지 못한 건 지난 2년 동안 다들 이래라저래라 했기 때문이에요 정말 싫어요!

translation.en: -I hate it! -Good!
Just keep yelling. Just get it out as we walk.
translation.ko: 좋아, 계속 소리 질러 가면서 다 풀자

translation.en: I hate everything! Walk and talk! Walk and talk!
Especially Summer.
I hate Summer so much!
I'm guessing the girlfriend, not the season?
How could he be with her?
-Doesn't he love my mama anymore? -Of course he loves her.
translation.ko: 이젠 엄마 안 사랑해요? 당연히 사랑하시지 집에 가서 아빠한테 직접 말하자

translation.en: But you should talk to him about it in the house!
translation.ko: 당연히 사랑하시지 집에 가서 아빠한테 직접 말하자

translation.en: I can't.
[sobbing] I can't talk to anybody except my mama!
translation.ko: 난 엄마 빼곤 아무하고도 말을 못 하겠어요!

translation.en: Cassidy…
I'm so sorry. I… I know how painful it is. And honey,
translation.ko: 너무 속상하다 얼마나 힘든지 내가 알아

translation.en: finally letting go like this is a good thing. All that--
translation.ko: 그래도 이렇게 말했다는 게 중요한 거야

translation.en: -[wood splinters] -[Bailey] Oh my God, Cassidy! God.
It'd be so much more helpful if you would just move your feet.
Draggin' works, too.
-Oh, thank God. I found her. -You found her?
[Cassidy] Daddy! It's okay. It's okay.
Hug and walk. Hug and walk.
Hey. Mornin'.
Oh, you're up. You're here. I'm just gonna go to the dryer and grab my clothes.
translation.ko: 일어났군요? 여기 있었네요 옷 가지러 건조기에 가려고요

translation.en: Oh, by the way, that pillow top mattress… It's like I died and went to heaven.
translation.ko: 그 토퍼 있는 매트리스 덕에 시체 돼서 천국 갔다 왔어요

translation.en: Not died. Not heaven. Oh God, Cassidy's not here, is she?
translation.ko: 웬 시체, 웬 천국 캐시디는 못 들었겠죠?

translation.en: She is still sleeping. I don't remember the last time she slept this late.
translation.ko: 여태 자고 있어요 이렇게 푹 잔 게 언젠가 싶군요

translation.en: [sighs] Oh, that makes me so happy.
Okay, I'm just gonna go grab my clothes.
[Beau] Oh, they're right here.
You folded my laundry?
No man has ever folded my laundry. Not to imply there have been so many men,
translation.ko: 빨래 개는 남자는 처음인데 남자를 많이 만났다는 게 아니라

translation.en: but the man I was with never once folded my laundry,
translation.ko: 나랑 살던 남자는 내 빨래를 한 번도 안 개어 줬고

translation.en: never once did a dish, and twice forgot my birthday.
translation.ko: 설거지도 안 하고 내 생일도 두 번 까먹었어요

translation.en: Sure can pick 'em.
Well, It is the least I could do. I mean, you brought my little girl back.
translation.ko: 뭐라도 하고 싶었어요 딸을 찾아준 은인인데

translation.en: -What else can I do to thank you? -Coffee'd be nice.
translation.ko: - 제가 해드릴 게 없을까요? - 커피면 충분해요

translation.en: Oh, thank goodness. I thought you were gonna ask for cash.
translation.ko: 십 년 감수했네 돈 달랄까 봐 떨었어요

translation.en: -How do you take it? -Fifties would be nice.
Oh, I hope you're giving her money to buy pants.
See, I know those pajamas come with pants 'cause I gave 'em to Beau for Christmas.
translation.ko: 그게 원래 바지도 있는 잠옷이에요 내가 선물한 거라 알죠

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm just gonna throw these pants on.
Well, Bailey…
how soon can you start?
Start? I already got my second leg in.
translation.ko: 시작? 벌써 다리 둘 다 넣었는데요

translation.en: I mean, how soon can you start as our nanny?
translation.ko: 보모 일 언제부터 할래요? 방은 이미 결정됐죠?

translation.en: The room's already fixed up, and you said you liked the mattress.
translation.ko: 보모 일 언제부터 할래요? 방은 이미 결정됐죠? 좋아하는 매트리스를 써요

translation.en: But darlin', she's not a nanny, remember?
Well, she could've fooled me.
I've never seen the kids respond to anybody like this.
translation.ko: 애들이 이렇게 말 잘 듣는 건 처음 봤어

translation.en: Yeah, but she's not a professional. I bet she doesn't even know CPR.
translation.ko: 하지만 전문 보모가 아니잖아 CPR도 할 줄 모를걸?

translation.en: -No, I know CPR. -Do you know the Heimlich?
-I do. -Do you know where Beau keeps the bourbon?
Well, Summer's right. I'm not a nanny, I'm a singer.
translation.ko: 서머 말이 맞아요 난 보모가 아니라 가수예요

translation.en: Been my dream since I was four years old.
Well, you can't give up on your dream!
Well, things are a little tougher now that my dream's turned into a nightmare.
translation.ko: 꿈이 악몽으로 변하는 바람에 좀 힘들어지긴 했어요

translation.en: I got no money, no place to sing, nowhere to live.
translation.ko: 돈도 없고 노래할 무대도 없고 살 집도 없으니까

translation.en: Maybe I should try this nanny thing.
-You're stayin'? -Yes, she's stayin'!
Hold on. She hasn't said yes yet.
Let me handle this, Daddy. Name your price, Bailey.
translation.ko: 제게 맡겨요, 아빠 액수 불러요, 베일리

translation.en: Everybody's got a price. And don't settle. He squeezes the quarter so tight,
translation.ko: 희망 금액에서 물러서지 마요 아빠는 워낙 짠돌이라 돈에서 짠내가 좀 날 거예요

translation.en: the eagle screams.
translation.ko: 아빠는 워낙 짠돌이라 돈에서 짠내가 좀 날 거예요

translation.en: But Bailey doesn't want to be a nanny, she wants to be a singer.
translation.ko: 하지만 베일리는 보모 하기 싫대 꿈이 가수라잖아

translation.en: Well, why can't you be a nanny and a singer?
Yeah, Maria from The Sound of Music was a singer, a nanny, and a nun.
translation.ko: '사운드 오브 뮤직'의 마리아는 가수 겸 보모 겸 수녀님이었어요

translation.en: That horse has already left the barn.
I don't get it.
Good.
If you move in with us, you'll have an even better shot at being a singer.
translation.ko: 우리 집에 들어오면 가수의 꿈에 더 가까워질 거예요

translation.en: Trust me. You got talent, kid. The only reason you haven't made it
translation.ko: 날 믿어요, 재능이 있던데요? 여태 뜨지 못했던 건 괜찮은 매니저가 없어서죠

translation.en: is because you've been lacking decent management.
translation.ko: 여태 뜨지 못했던 건 괜찮은 매니저가 없어서죠

translation.en: But the good news is, you stay here, I'm willing to offer you a mere 20%.
translation.ko: 근데 여기 남는다면 내가 20%만 받고 맡을게요

translation.en: Managers only charge ten. Fifteen it is.
Well, morning, sleepyhead.
What time is it? Time to celebrate.
Bailey's gonna be our new nanny!
Unless you have any objections, Cass.
But she is not a nanny, Cassidy.
And I appeal to you, as the responsible lady of the house,
translation.ko: 이 집의 여자 책임자로서 의견을 낼게

translation.en: do you think it's a good idea to put your life and the lives of your siblings
in the hands of someone who's just not a professional?
Let me tell you a little story, Summer.
Once upon a time, we had a chicken named Naomi.
translation.ko: 예전에 우리 집에서 나오미라는 닭을 키웠어요

translation.en: Mama named her after Naomi Judd ‘cause they both battled depression.
translation.ko: 나오미 저드처럼 우울증이라고 엄마가 지어준 이름이죠

translation.en: Well, we found out the reason our Naomi was so sad
translation.ko: 근데 나오미가 그렇게 우울했던 이유를 알아냈어요

translation.en: was ‘cause she was laying fewer and fewer eggs,
and started to feel like the best years of her life were behind her.
translation.ko: 좋은 시절은 다 갔다고 느끼기 시작했던 거예요

translation.en: I feel that's what's happening to Bailey.
I mean, what has she got left?
She lost her man, her home, her career.
And like Naomi, she's no spring chicken.
What are you sayin', darlin'?
I'm sayin',
we didn't get rid of Naomi.
So you want me to stay?
Who else is gonna take you? [sobs] No one!
translation.ko: - 우리 말고 받아줄 사람 있어요? - 없지!

translation.en: All right, well, welcome to the family, Naomi.
translation.ko: 잘됐군요 우리 집에 온 걸 환영해요, 나오미
